name: Montant et mode de paiement égaux

Montant égaux et date dans les fourchettes (30J)
Montant égaux et date dans les fourchettes (45J)

Montant (5%) et date dans les fourchettes (15J)
query: moveLine?.debit >= debit * 0.95 && moveLine?.debit <= debit * 1.05 && moveLine?.credit >= credit * 0.95 && moveLine?.credit <= credit * 1.05 && moveLine?.date?.before(operationDate?.plus(15)) && (moveLine?.date?.after(operationDate?.minus(15)) || moveLine?.date?.before(valueDate?.plus(15)) && moveLine?.date?.after(valueDate?.minus(15)) || moveLine?.dueDate?.before(operationDate?.plus(15)) && moveLine?.dueDate?.after(operationDate?.minus(15)) || moveLine?.dueDate?.before(valueDate?.plus(15)) && moveLine?.dueDate?.after(valueDate?.minus(15)))

name: Montant dans les fourchettes
query: moveLine?.debit >= debit * 0.95 && moveLine?.debit <= debit * 1.05 && moveLine?.credit >= credit * 0.95 && moveLine?.credit <= credit * 1.05

name: Montant dans les fourchettes
query: moveLine?.debit >= debit * 0.90 && moveLine?.debit <= debit * 1.1 && moveLine?.credit >= credit * 0.90 && moveLine?.credit <= credit * 1.1
